text:
Desperate to remain relevant Greta launches campaign to fight coronavirus

Calling it a child-rights crisis & comparing it to....wait for it....Climate Change 

Seeking donation to...wait for it...the UN 
through UNICEF 😉😉

https://t.co/yoFMQqPxnr
